coverLetter:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my strong interest in the Estimator position at Delkon. With my background and passion for delivering excellent results, I am confident in my ability to contribute meaningfully to your team.

Your job posting caught my attention, particularly your emphasis on Estimate, tender, stair. My experience aligns well with these values and your requirements.

I am excited about the opportunity to bring my skills and enthusiasm to Delkon. I am confident that my qualifications make me an ideal candidate for this role.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to your team's success.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
description:
Estimate and tender stair, balustrade, and carpentry packages for residential and commercial projects

Engage with builders, developers, and clients throughout the enquiry, tender, and quoting process

Review architectural drawings, specifications, and schedules

Complete accurate take-offs and pricing, obtaining supplier and subcontractor quotes

Prepare competitive quotes and tender submissions on time

Maintain project and client data using software such as Simpro and Buildxact

Attend meetings and site visits as required
